title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change immediately.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the UI.
2. Modify the font size of the label.
3. Observe that the label height does not change right after the font size is modified.
OB: The label height remains unchanged after modifying the font size in the UI.
EB: After modifying the font size of the label, the label height should be adjusted according to the new font size.
SR:
1. Open the UI.
2. Modify the font size of the label.
3. Verify that the label height is adjusted to match the new font size.
